name: Riptide GP: Renegade
description: Experience a future of illicit hydrojet racing, where armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls, dodge cops, and boost across surging waves. Unlock new vehicles, characters, and customization features as you take down bosses and build your crew in Career mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 (64-bit) Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space
